message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to consider acquiring this exceptional item. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,300,000.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but it's slightly above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,150,000 for the product. This is my best offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value to both of us.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to engage in negotiations. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a compromise. Our counteroffer for the product would be $1,250,000. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget constraints.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  While $1,250,000 is closer, it's still a bit too high for me.  I'm prepared to pay $1,200,000, my absolute maximum.  Let's see if we can make this deal work.
